thread.section_title: eSURRANTY.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eSURRANTY.com | esurranty.com
thread.title: Altamash Khan

author: Altamash Khan
title: Altamash Khan
text: I filed a claim more than a month back and did not get a reply until 2 weeks later. In the mean time, they keep on saying that they'll get to me in a day or two. When they did get back to me, the representative could not provide me with a tracking number for my loaner phone. I have been waiting for a for my loaner phone ever since. Every time I email them, they tell me they'll provide me with the tracking number after talking to their mailing department (Do yo even have one, I don't think so). If it's taking so much time to receive a loaner phone imagine how long will it take to get my phone repaired. I hate the service. I would give them 0 stars if possible. Please don't subscribe.
